bug.author: Ehtasha
bug.description:
Thanks fro this great tool. I'm willing to use this tool for semantic segmentation. Tool is install and I have saved JSON file after the annotation. But whenever I run this bellow command to generate mask image from annotated image. It gives me this error. labelme_draw_label_png C:\Users\Lenovo\Desktop\custom_nails_dataset\01\01.png To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Annotate image and save it
Open annoconda prompt and run bellow two commands
activate labelme
labelme_draw_label_png C:\Users\Lenovo\Desktop\custom_nails_dataset\01\01.png
See error: AttributeError: Module 'labelsme.utils' has no attribute 'draw_label'
Expected behavior Generate mask image and label txt file.
<denchmark-link:></denchmark-link>
Desktop
Windows Labelme Version [4.2.10]

comments.comment: This is because draw_label_png.py has not updated with imgviz. I requested a pull.
